response.overview: If you've walked around Toronto, Ontario Canada you'd recognize b&w posters for screenings of "Dark Side of Oz," "Triumph of the Will" and Salvador Dali at the Cineforum. The Cineforum was a makeshift theatre inside a Bathurst St. home that belonged to Reg Hartt, a place of legend for those who dared to enter.
response.title: Hartt of Darkness
